title: 3-Bedroom Home-Huge Master Suite 8-19-22
app_fee: $45.00 Application & Screening Fee for Applicants 18 years +
posting_body: We want to welcome you home to Weatherstone Apartments!
Open soon, a spacious 3-bedrooms 2-bathroom Home on the ground floor!
With all-new carpet, paint, counters, and more!
Get in on this beautiful deal.
Enjoy a warm drink on your private back deck surrounded by trees and foliage.
With 17 acres of garden-like grounds and a wood-burning Fireplace, this place feels like living in the country.
Our apartments are comfortable and spacious with large closets, bright windows, a full washer and dryer, and an open floorplan with a breakfast bar.
Included in rent is a Reserved Parking Space at no extra cost!
Please leave a message if we are unable to get to your call in time.
Weatherstone is Pet Friendly and welcomes Dogs and Cats in all shapes and sizes!
Utilities for a 3 bedroom are an additional $130.
Ask to be email information, pictures, and online applications!
Close to Shopping, PSNS, Schools, and More.
On a Bus Route with Park & Ride Close By.
Call to schedule a tour, Weekday 9-5 and Saturdays by appointment.
Minutes from Schools, Shopping, Entertainment & Employment...Washer & Dryer in Every Home...
Pet Friendly, No Pet Rent or Breed/Weight Restrictions!
Weatherstone Apartment Homes is Proudly Managed by TECTON CORPORATION.
*Our Business Office is open Monday-Friday between 9:00 AM & 5:00 PM.
